>> do you think it is possible to make a research of about 50-60 pages 
about Takasugi Shinsaku even if those books concern other main 
charachters?

Sorry, Daniele, I don't quite understand the question. Both these books 
have quite a lot about Takasugi Shinsaku in them, especially the Craig. To 
get more information on Shinsaku - I don't know what else to suggest 
unless you read Japanese abd can look at Japanese amazon for what 
they've got there. I think someone (Hide?) gave a link once before.

Cheers,

Gillian
